name: MSR WindBurner Sauce Pot CV2
description: Increase your feasting capacity by adding this big pot to an MSR WindBurner Stove. Great for groups of 2 to 4 people, for simmering meals or for melting snow. This updated version has a Fusion ceramic coating that is safe at high temperature, and PTFE- and PFOA-free.Hard anodized aluminum with a Fusion® ceramic coating.Aluminum strainer lid has locking hatches for safe and easy straining.Integrated heat exchanger encloses heating element, ensuring rapid boil times no matter what the wind is doing.Nests with other MSR WindBurner Group Stove System items.110g or 227g fuel canister (sold separately) nests perfectly inside.Compatible exclusively with the WindBurner remote-canister stove (Duo, Group and Combo) Systems. Not for use with the WindBurner Personal top-mounted stove.
